name: initialize_subscription
attributes: # [doc = " ユーザーのサブスクアカウントを初回のみ初期化し、開始日と０トークンを設定します。"]
body: let acct = & mut ctx . accounts . subscription ;
acct . user = ctx . accounts . user . key () ;

name: claim_monthly
attributes: # [doc = " 署名済みユーザーがトークンを受け取る。経過月数×定額100を加算。"]
body: let acct = & mut ctx . accounts . subscription ;
let months = ((current_ts - acct . start_timestamp) / 2_592_000) as u64 ;
msg ! ("User {:?} claimed {} tokens ({} months), total = {}" , acct . user , earned , months , acct . accumulated) ;

name: view_subscription
attributes: # [doc = " 現在の累計をログ出力します。"]
body: msg ! ("User {:?}: start={}, accumulated={}" , acct . user , acct . start_timestamp , acct . accumulated) ;
